title: # 316 - Heather McDonald & ME
description:
I sit down with Heather McDonald in the man cave to talk about doing sets, how her husband found out he was having a baby, having your kids in your comedy, working with Chelsea Handler, and much more!

You can check out Heather McDonalds Podcast "Juicy Scoop" on iTunes now!

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.  

This episode is also brought to you by Hopsy, the "Keurig for beer". Go to www.tryhopsy.com/bertcast and use promo code "Bertcast" to get the SUB home draft machine, 2 mini-kegs of beer, 2 Hopsy glasses, and free membership in the monthly beer club for $99.   

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
